title: HELP NEEED. CAN'T LOGIN ONLY UP TO LOL ICON
body:
Please help...
new install on laptop. After opening the launcher, LOL icon pops up and a bar under it is loading.
When the bar is at about 10% the icon just disappeared and nothing happen.
Does anybody know how to fix this?
Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
When League tries to launch but doesn't properly come up, it's typically due to not having proper system permissions. To address this, I suggest you try the solutions listed on our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Many of the solutions are pretty simple tasks and could resolve the issue fairly quickly.

Let me know if you run into any issues with the guide.
